name: Colossea
description:
Colossea is an oceanic game where you convert wild marine fish into your shoal to face the colossi of the deep! 🐟

Our golden fish is just beginning, but we intend to catch bigger fish in the future, for that we need your help when testing different aspects of our game, such as.

  • Gameplay
  • Sound effects
  • Visual effects
  • Mechanics
  • Balancing
  • Satisfaction
  • And many other items you want to talk about

We'll love to read each of the feedbacks you send us.

All sounds used in the game on this link

Game developed with a lot of love by:
Icaro de Oliveira Reis - Instagram | ArtStation - 3D Artist
Jader Gedeon De O. Rocha - Linkedin - Programming
Larissa Teixeira Araujo - Instagram | Linkedin - UX/UI Designer
Victor A. Tiburcio de Moraes - Linkedin - Programming

Contact Email - Colossea.oficial@gmail.com
